name: FridayNightBattle - SourceCode. Html 5, Mobile
description:
Buy SourceCode Construct 3

Friday Night Battle is a rhythm game with different characters in which you have to press the right button at the right time to dance and fight the blue monster. Exclusive music specially for this game. Defeat the blue monster with the boy or the red monster to advance to the next Friday. The game will appeal to music lovers and reaction game lovers.
The game is made on Construct 3. This is only the first version.

Features:

-Made with Construct 3;

-Music & Battle game;

-HD (2400×1080);

-Landscape (3:2, 5:3,16:10, 16:9, 2:1, 22:9);

-Html5;

-Mobile;

-adMob;

-2 monsters (Hugy Wugy & Kisy Misy);

-2 human;

-Exclusive music;

Files included:

-Construct 3 project(*.c3p);

-Html5;

-512×512 icon;

-Documentation

next update:

-adding new music;

-tutorial level;

Wait for more games and subscribe

Please do not hesitate to contact us for any questions
